pages.title: Introduction
pages.text: Welcome to the Vault Hunters 2.5 Modpack!$(br2)To start the Journey of a Vault Hunter, you require a few things first, namely a $(l:get_started/vault_altar)Vault Altar$(), $(l:get_started/vault_rock)Vault Rocks$() and you will require a $(l:get_started/vault_portal)Portal Frame.$()$(br2)Vault Hunters is a $(#f00)difficult Modpack$(), so be wary of the challenges that you may face in $(#033dfc)the Vault$()!

pages.title: Preparations
pages.text: In $(#033dfc)Vaults$(), your health $(#f00)$(l)will not naturally regenerate$(), so you will have to be careful.$(br2)Prior to entering $(#033dfc)a Vault$(), you should prepare yourself with a few things, mainly enchanted Armor, Food, Healing and Crates, Shulkers or Common Backpacks to store richities obtained in $(#033dfc)the Vault$().$(br)Upon spawing, you get 5 Skill points which you can spend in the Skill tree, openable by pressing $(#033dfc)$(k:the_vault.open_ability_tree)$().
